name: pnp-sp-dev-spfx-web-parts-react-sp-bookmarks
title: Bookmarks Manager
shortDescription: Allows users to manage and organize bookmarks in a SharePoint list.
longDescription: The Bookmarks Manager web part allows users to manage and organize bookmarks in a SharePoint list. Users can add, edit, and delete bookmarks, which are displayed in a grid layout. The web part supports both light and dark themes and integrates seamlessly with SharePoint.

references.name: Build your first SharePoint client-side web part
references.description: Client-side web parts are client-side components that run in the context of a SharePoint page. Client-side web parts can be deployed to SharePoint environments that support the SharePoint Framework. You can also use modern JavaScript web frameworks, tools, and libraries to build them.
